alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 6:22PM CDT until March 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kimble County in west central Texas... Southeastern Sutton County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of I-10 Near The Sutton-Kimble County Line, or 17 miles southwest of Roosevelt, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roosevelt around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include I- 10 Near The Sutton-Kimble County Line and Us-377 Near The Kimble- Edwards County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 423 and 448. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
